title: Categories and Sharepoint Folder Layout
summary: This spreadsheet contains two sheets: 'Categories-Tags' and 'Sharepoint Folder Layout'. The 'Categories-Tags' sheet lists various document categories such as Meeting Notes, Strategy Memo, Forecast Analysis, and Inventory Report, along with their descriptions and associated tags like demand-planning, supply-planning, and forecasting. The 'Sharepoint Folder Layout' sheet outlines the structure and purpose of folders used for organizing documents, including folders for administrative documents, project plans, and client documents, with specific subfolders for Statements of Work.
